text: @piersmorgan @DominicRaab My mum is in private care home &pays 905 week, it’s not government responsibility to supply PPE to private homes.The home has no Covid19, they decided to lockdown 12 March wise decision. Other homes could have closed earlier,they didn’t have to wait to to be told by government
